1.text: 1. State whether the following statements are TRUE or FALSE. a. Sinbad had a large fortune. - b. The ship sailed to several harbours. - c. They landed on an island. - d. The creature was big. - e. Sinbad swam to an island. -
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> State <break time='200ms'/> whether <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> statements <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> TRUE <break time='200ms'/> or <break time='200ms'/> FALSE. <break time='200ms'/> a. <break time='200ms'/> Sinbad <break time='200ms'/> had <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> large <break time='200ms'/> fortune. <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> b. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> ship <break time='200ms'/> sailed <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> several <break time='200ms'/> harbours. <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> c. <break time='200ms'/> They <break time='200ms'/> landed <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> an <break time='200ms'/> island. <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> d. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> creature <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> big. <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/> e. <break time='200ms'/> Sinbad <break time='200ms'/> swam <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> an <break time='200ms'/> island. <break time='200ms'/> - <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: 2. Answer the questions. a. Where did Sinbad sail? b. Why did he go sailing? c. What happened to the ship? d. Where did Sinbad and his crew land? e. Write a description of Sinbad.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. <break time='200ms'/> Answer <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> questions. <break time='200ms'/> a. <break time='200ms'/> Where <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> Sinbad <break time='200ms'/> sail? <break time='200ms'/> b. <break time='200ms'/> Why <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> he <break time='200ms'/> go <break time='200ms'/> sailing? <break time='200ms'/> c. <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> happened <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> ship? <break time='200ms'/> d. <break time='200ms'/> Where <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> Sinbad <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> crew <break time='200ms'/> land? <break time='200ms'/> e. <break time='200ms'/> Write <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> description <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> Sinbad. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: 3. Write an ending to the story.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. <break time='200ms'/> Write <break time='200ms'/> an <break time='200ms'/> ending <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> story. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: Form groups and narrate a similar folk story from Sri Lanka or from another country to the class.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Form <break time='200ms'/> groups <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> narrate <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> similar <break time='200ms'/> folk <break time='200ms'/> story <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> Sri <break time='200ms'/> Lanka <break time='200ms'/> or <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> another <break time='200ms'/> country <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> class. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Study <break time='200ms'/> these <break time='200ms'/> phrases. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.text: a litter of puppies a herd of cows a bunch of flowers a flock of pigeons a bunch of ripe bananas
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a <break time='200ms'/> litter <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> puppies <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> herd <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> cows <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> bunch <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> flowers <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> flock <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> pigeons <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> bunch <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> ripe <break time='200ms'/> bananas <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.text: The words in bold are called collective nouns. We use collective nouns to bring a group of people or objects together.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The <break time='200ms'/> words <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> bold <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> called <break time='200ms'/> collective <break time='200ms'/> nouns. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> use <break time='200ms'/> collective <break time='200ms'/> nouns <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> bring <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> group <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> people <break time='200ms'/> or <break time='200ms'/> objects <break time='200ms'/> together. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
